meanings.definition: Anticipating or precluding an objection or argument.
meanings.sent1: The proleptically response addressed all possible concerns.
meanings.sent2: She proleptically prepared her defense before the debate.
meanings.sent3: His proleptically attitude made him a formidable debater.
meanings.sent4: The proleptically strategy silenced any doubts before they arose.
meanings.sent5: The proleptically approach left no room for opposition.

meanings.definition: In a manner that anticipates and answers objections or arguments.
meanings.sent1: She spoke proleptically, countering every doubt raised.
meanings.sent2: He proleptically refuted the opposing claims.
meanings.sent3: The team proleptically tackled each argument with ease.
meanings.sent4: The solution was proleptically presented, leaving no room for doubt.
meanings.sent5: The speaker proleptically addressed all concerns, leaving the audience impressed.

meanings.definition: In a way that anticipates and addresses potential objections or arguments.
meanings.sent1: The report was proleptically structured to address any doubts.
meanings.sent2: She proleptically responded to the criticism with confidence.
meanings.sent3: His proleptically approach to the issue impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The proleptically crafted response left no room for further questions.
meanings.sent5: The proleptically delivered speech convinced even the skeptics.
